resources.string: Enter name to add score to score board. Press back to return to Main Menu

This is a very simple Math Game directed at middle and high school students. The game challenges and builds students cognitive ability by solving a simple math question, locating the moving answer and selecting it within a given amount of time. The speed of the moving answers increases every time a student selects the correct answer.

The game begins with a 3 second count down. The student has a limited amount of time to select the bubble containing the answer depending on the difficulty set in the settings. If bubbles overlap than give the phone a shake and the bubbles will disperse. When a player eventually runs out of time, he is given a chance to save his score to a leaderboard and to share on twitter.
